summary: Music platform with song/podcast management, subscription plans, artist profiles, and public 'link in bio' pages for sharing songs on streaming platforms
architectural_notes: Public song pages at /song/[song-id] - no authentication required
Streaming platform integration with Spotify and Apple Music
Platform-specific styling with logos and brand colors for streaming buttons
Admin approval workflow gates public page visibility
known_issues: Previous builds of link in bio feature failed - using simplified approach
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Spotify logo icon on white background, circular or square format suitable for button display (spotify-logo.dim_128x128.png)
- Apple Music logo icon on white background, circular or square format suitable for button display (apple-music-logo.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Create public song pages at `/song/[song-id]` that display song artwork, title, artist name with verification badge, and streaming platform links
Add 'Manage Links' button to admin song list that opens a dialog for adding/editing streaming platform URLs for individual songs
Display streaming platform links as styled buttons with platform logos and brand colors on public song pages
Render generated platform logo images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated

new_feature_requests.summary: Public 'link in bio' song pages with streaming platform links (Spotify, Apple Music) - admin approval required
Admin dashboard 'Manage Links' button for adding/editing streaming URLs
Add streaming platform link fields to song data model for Spotify and Apple Music URLs
Public song pages are only accessible after admin approval - songs with status other than 'live' return 404 or access denied
